{"compiler":{"version":"0.5.17+commit.d19bba13"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"fromPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"staker","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"stakingEpoch","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"ClaimedOrderedWithdrawal","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":false,"internalType":"address","name":"fromPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"toPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"staker","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"stakingEpoch","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"MovedStake","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"fromPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"staker","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"stakingEpoch","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"int256","name":"amount","type":"int256"}],"name":"OrderedWithdrawal","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"toPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"staker","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"stakingEpoch","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"PlacedStake","type":"event"},{"anonymous":false,"inputs":[{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"fromPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"address","name":"staker","type":"address"},{"indexed":true,"internalType":"uint256","name":"stakingEpoch","type":"uint256"},{"indexed":false,"internalType":"uint256","name":"amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"WithdrewStake","type":"event"},{"payable":true,"stateMutability":"payable","type":"fallback"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"MAX_CANDIDATES","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_miningAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"_publicKey","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"bytes16","name":"_ip","type":"bytes16"}],"name":"addPool","outputs":[],"payable":true,"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"areStakeAndWithdrawAllowed","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"candidateMinStake","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_poolStakingAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"claimOrderedWithdraw","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"currentKeyGenExtraTimeWindow","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"delegatorMinStake","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"delegatorStakeSnapshot","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_poolAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"getPoolInternetAddress","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes16","name":"","type":"bytes16"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_poolAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"getPoolPublicKey","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"","type":"bytes"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"getPools","outputs":[{"internalType":"address[]","name":"","type":"address[]"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"getPoolsInactive","outputs":[{"internalType":"address[]","name":"","type":"address[]"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"getPoolsLikelihood","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256[]","name":"likelihoods","type":"uint256[]"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"sum","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"getPoolsToBeElected","outputs":[{"internalType":"address[]","name":"","type":"address[]"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"getPoolsToBeRemoved","outputs":[{"internalType":"address[]","name":"","type":"address[]"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[],"name":"incrementStakingEpoch","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_validatorSetContract","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address[]","name":"_initialStakingAddresses","type":"address[]"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_delegatorMinStake","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_candidateMinStake","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_maxStake","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_stakingFixedEpochDuration","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_stakingTransitionTimeframeLength","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_stakingWithdrawDisallowPeriod","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes32[]","name":"_publicKeys","type":"bytes32[]"},{"internalType":"bytes16[]","name":"_internetAddresses","type":"bytes16[]"}],"name":"initialize","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"isInitialized","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_stakingAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"isPoolActive","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"maxStakeAmount","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_poolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_staker","type":"address"}],"name":"maxWithdrawAllowed","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_poolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_staker","type":"address"}],"name":"maxWithdrawOrderAllowed","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_fromPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_toPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"moveStake","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_stakingAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"notifyAvailability","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[],"name":"notifyKeyGenFailed","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"detectedOfflineTime","type":"uint256"}],"name":"notifyNetworkOfftimeDetected","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_poolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"int256","name":"_amount","type":"int256"}],"name":"orderWithdraw","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"orderWithdrawEpoch","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"orderedWithdrawAmount","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"orderedWithdrawAmountTotal","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"poolDelegatorInactiveIndex","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"poolDelegatorIndex","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_poolStakingAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"poolDelegators","outputs":[{"internalType":"address[]","name":"","type":"address[]"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_poolStakingAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"poolDelegatorsInactive","outputs":[{"internalType":"address[]","name":"","type":"address[]"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"poolInactiveIndex","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"poolIndex","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"poolInfo","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"publicKey","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"bytes16","name":"internetAddress","type":"bytes16"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"poolToBeElectedIndex","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"poolToBeRemovedIndex","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[],"name":"removeMyPool","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_stakingAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"removePool","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[],"name":"removePools","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"name":"rewardWasTaken","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"","type":"bool"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_minStake","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setCandidateMinStake","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_minStake","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setDelegatorMinStake","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes","name":"_publicKey","type":"bytes"},{"internalType":"bytes16","name":"_ip","type":"bytes16"}],"name":"setPoolInfo","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_timestamp","type":"uint256"}],"name":"setStakingEpochStartTime","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_toPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"}],"name":"stake","outputs":[],"payable":true,"stateMutability":"payable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"stakeAmount","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_poolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"_staker","type":"address"}],"name":"stakeAmountByCurrentEpoch","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"stakeAmountTotal","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"stakeFirstEpoch","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"","type":"address"}],"name":"stakeLastEpoch","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"stakingEpoch","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"stakingEpochStartBlock","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"stakingEpochStartTime","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"stakingFixedEpochDuration","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"stakingFixedEpochEndTime","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"stakingTransitionTimeframeLength","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"stakingWithdrawDisallowPeriod","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"startTimeOfNextPhaseTransition","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"","type":"uint256"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[],"name":"upgrade","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"validatorSetContract","outputs":[{"internalType":"contract IValidatorSetHbbft","name":"","type":"address"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"_fromPoolStakingAddress","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_amount","type":"uint256"}],"name":"withdraw","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"Implements staking and withdrawal logic.","methods":{"addPool(address,bytes,bytes16)":{"details":"Adds a new candidate's pool to the list of active pools (see the `getPools` getter) and moves the specified amount of staking coins from the candidate's staking address to the candidate's pool. A participant calls this function using their staking address when they want to create a pool. This is a wrapper for the `stake` function.","params":{"_miningAddress":"The mining address of the candidate. The mining address is bound to the staking address (msg.sender). This address cannot be equal to `msg.sender`."}},"areStakeAndWithdrawAllowed()":{"details":"Determines whether staking/withdrawal operations are allowed at the moment. Used by all staking/withdrawal functions."},"claimOrderedWithdraw(address)":{"details":"Withdraws the staking coins from the specified pool ordered during the previous staking epochs with the `orderWithdraw` function. The ordered amount can be retrieved by the `orderedWithdrawAmount` getter.","params":{"_poolStakingAddress":"The staking address of the pool from which the ordered coins are withdrawn."}},"getPoolInternetAddress(address)":{"details":"Returns the registered IPv4 Address for the node.","params":{"_poolAddress":"The Pool Address to query the IPv4Address for."},"return":"IPv4 Address for the given pool address. "},"getPoolPublicKey(address)":{"details":"Return the Public Key used by a Node to send targeted HBBFT Consensus Messages.","params":{"_poolAddress":"The Pool Address to query the public key for."},"return":"the public key for the given pool address.  Note that the public key does not convert to the ethereum address of the pool address. The pool address is used for stacking, and not for signing HBBFT messages."},"getPools()":{"details":"Returns an array of the current active pools (the staking addresses of candidates and validators). The size of the array cannot exceed MAX_CANDIDATES. A pool can be added to this array with the `_addPoolActive` internal function which is called by the `stake` or `orderWithdraw` function. A pool is considered active if its address has at least the minimum stake and this stake is not ordered to be withdrawn."},"getPoolsInactive()":{"details":"Returns an array of the current inactive pools (the staking addresses of former candidates). A pool can be added to this array with the `_addPoolInactive` internal function which is called by `_removePool`. A pool is considered inactive if it is banned for some reason, if its address has zero stake, or if its entire stake is ordered to be withdrawn."},"getPoolsLikelihood()":{"details":"Returns the array of stake amounts for each corresponding address in the `poolsToBeElected` array (see the `getPoolsToBeElected` getter) and a sum of these amounts. Used by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function when randomly selecting new validators at the last block of a staking epoch. An array value is updated every time any staked amount is changed in this pool (see the `_setLikelihood` internal function).","return":"`uint256[] likelihoods` - The array of the coefficients. The array length is always equal to the length of the `poolsToBeElected` array. `uint256 sum` - The total sum of the amounts."},"getPoolsToBeElected()":{"details":"Returns the list of pools (their staking addresses) which will participate in a new validator set selection process in the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function. This is an array of pools which will be considered as candidates when forming a new validator set (at the last block of a staking epoch). This array is kept updated by the `_addPoolToBeElected` and `_deletePoolToBeElected` internal functions."},"getPoolsToBeRemoved()":{"details":"Returns the list of pools (their staking addresses) which will be removed by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function from the active `pools` array (at the last block of a staking epoch). This array is kept updated by the `_addPoolToBeRemoved` and `_deletePoolToBeRemoved` internal functions. A pool is added to this array when the pool's address withdraws (or orders) all of its own staking coins from the pool, inactivating the pool."},"incrementStakingEpoch()":{"details":"Increments the serial number of the current staking epoch. Called by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` at the last block of the finished staking epoch."},"initialize(address,address[],uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,bytes32[],bytes16[])":{"details":"Initializes the network parameters. Can only be called by the constructor of the `InitializerHbbft` contract or owner.","params":{"_candidateMinStake":"The minimum allowed amount of candidate/validator stake in Wei.","_delegatorMinStake":"The minimum allowed amount of delegator stake in Wei.","_initialStakingAddresses":"The array of initial validators' staking addresses.","_stakingFixedEpochDuration":"The fixed duration of each epoch before keyGen starts.","_stakingTransitionTimeframeLength":"Length of the timeframe in seconds for the transition to the new validator set.","_stakingWithdrawDisallowPeriod":"The duration period at the end of a staking epoch during which participants cannot stake/withdraw/order/claim their staking coins","_validatorSetContract":"The address of the `ValidatorSetHbbft` contract."}},"isInitialized()":{"details":"Returns a boolean flag indicating if the `initialize` function has been called."},"isPoolActive(address)":{"details":"Returns a flag indicating whether a specified address is in the `pools` array. See the `getPools` getter.","params":{"_stakingAddress":"The staking address of the pool."}},"maxWithdrawAllowed(address,address)":{"details":"Returns the maximum amount which can be withdrawn from the specified pool by the specified staker at the moment. Used by the `withdraw` and `moveStake` functions.","params":{"_poolStakingAddress":"The pool staking address from which the withdrawal will be made.","_staker":"The staker address that is going to withdraw."}},"maxWithdrawOrderAllowed(address,address)":{"details":"Returns the maximum amount which can be ordered to be withdrawn from the specified pool by the specified staker at the moment. Used by the `orderWithdraw` function.","params":{"_poolStakingAddress":"The pool staking address from which the withdrawal will be ordered.","_staker":"The staker address that is going to order the withdrawal."}},"moveStake(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Moves staking coins from one pool to another. A staker calls this function when they want to move their coins from one pool to another without withdrawing their coins.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of staking coins to be moved. The amount cannot exceed the value returned by the `maxWithdrawAllowed` getter.","_fromPoolStakingAddress":"The staking address of the source pool.","_toPoolStakingAddress":"The staking address of the target pool."}},"notifyAvailability(address)":{"details":"Notifies hbbft staking contract that a validator asociated with the given `_stakingAddress` became available again and can be put on to the list  of available nodes again."},"notifyKeyGenFailed()":{"details":"Notifies hbbft staking contract that the key generation has failed, and a new round  of keygeneration starts."},"notifyNetworkOfftimeDetected(uint256)":{"details":"Notifies hbbft staking contract about a detected network offline time. if there is no handling for this, validators got chosen outside the transition timewindow and get banned immediatly, since they never got their chance to write their keys. more about: https://github.com/DMDcoin/hbbft-posdao-contracts/issues/96"},"orderWithdraw(address,int256)":{"details":"Orders coins withdrawal from the staking address of the specified pool to the staker's address. The requested coins can be claimed after the current staking epoch is complete using the `claimOrderedWithdraw` function.","params":{"_amount":"The amount to be withdrawn. A positive value means the staker wants to either set or increase their withdrawal amount. A negative value means the staker wants to decrease a withdrawal amount that was previously set. The amount cannot exceed the value returned by the `maxWithdrawOrderAllowed` getter.","_poolStakingAddress":"The staking address of the pool from which the amount will be withdrawn."}},"poolDelegators(address)":{"details":"Returns an array of the current active delegators of the specified pool. A delegator is considered active if they have staked into the specified pool and their stake is not ordered to be withdrawn.","params":{"_poolStakingAddress":"The pool staking address."}},"poolDelegatorsInactive(address)":{"details":"Returns an array of the current inactive delegators of the specified pool. A delegator is considered inactive if their entire stake is ordered to be withdrawn but not yet claimed.","params":{"_poolStakingAddress":"The pool staking address."}},"removeMyPool()":{"details":"Removes the candidate's or validator's pool from the `pools` array (a list of active pools which can be retrieved by the `getPools` getter). When a candidate or validator wants to remove their pool, they should call this function from their staking address."},"removePool(address)":{"details":"Removes a specified pool from the `pools` array (a list of active pools which can be retrieved by the `getPools` getter). Called by the `ValidatorSetHbbft._removeMaliciousValidator` internal function,  and the `ValidatorSetHbbft.handleFailedKeyGeneration` function when a pool must be removed by the algorithm.","params":{"_stakingAddress":"The staking address of the pool to be removed."}},"removePools()":{"details":"Removes pools which are in the `_poolsToBeRemoved` internal array from the `pools` array. Called by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function when a pool must be removed by the algorithm."},"setCandidateMinStake(uint256)":{"details":"Sets (updates) the limit of the minimum candidate stake (CANDIDATE_MIN_STAKE). Can only be called by the `owner`.","params":{"_minStake":"The value of a new limit in Wei."}},"setDelegatorMinStake(uint256)":{"details":"Sets (updates) the limit of the minimum delegator stake (DELEGATOR_MIN_STAKE). Can only be called by the `owner`.","params":{"_minStake":"The value of a new limit in Wei."}},"setPoolInfo(bytes,bytes16)":{"details":"set's the pool info for a specific ethereum address.","params":{"_ip":"(optional) IPV4 address of a running Node Software or Proxy. Stores the supplied data for a staking (pool) address. This function is external available without security checks, since no array operations are used in the implementation, this allows the flexibility to set the pool information before adding the stake to the pool.","_publicKey":"public key of the (future) signing address."}},"setStakingEpochStartTime(uint256)":{"details":"Sets the timetamp of the current epoch's last block as the start time of the upcoming staking epoch. Called by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function at the last block of a staking epoch.","params":{"_timestamp":"The starting time of the very first block in the upcoming staking epoch."}},"stake(address)":{"details":"Moves the specified amount of staking coins from the staker's address to the staking address of the specified pool. Actually, the amount is stored in a balance of this StakingHbbft contract. A staker calls this function when they want to make a stake into a pool.","params":{"_toPoolStakingAddress":"The staking address of the pool where the coins should be staked."}},"stakeAmountByCurrentEpoch(address,address)":{"details":"Returns the amount of staking coins staked into the specified pool by the specified staker during the current staking epoch (see the `stakingEpoch` getter). Used by the `stake`, `withdraw`, and `orderWithdraw` functions.","params":{"_poolStakingAddress":"The pool staking address.","_staker":"The staker's address."}},"stakingFixedEpochEndTime()":{"details":"Returns an indicative time of the last block of the current staking epoch before key generation starts."},"startTimeOfNextPhaseTransition()":{"details":"indicates the time when the new validatorset for the next epoch gets chosen. this is the start of a timeframe before the end of the epoch, that is long enough for the validators to create a new shared key."},"upgrade()":{"details":"save function that can be called by anyone that fixes uninitialzed values."},"withdraw(address,uint256)":{"details":"Moves the specified amount of staking coins from the staking address of the specified pool to the staker's address. A staker calls this function when they want to withdraw their coins.","params":{"_amount":"The amount of coins to be withdrawn. The amount cannot exceed the value returned by the `maxWithdrawAllowed` getter.","_fromPoolStakingAddress":"The staking address of the pool from which the coins should be nodes.documentation:
@dev Notifies hbbft staking contract about a detected
 network offline time.
 if there is no handling for this,
 validators got chosen outside the transition timewindow
 and get banned immediatly, since they never got their chance
 to write their keys.
 more about: https://github.com/DMDcoin/hbbft-posdao-contracts/issues/96
nodes.name: notifyNetworkOfftimeDetected

nodes.documentation:
@dev Notifies hbbft staking contract that a validator
 asociated with the given `_stakingAddress` became
 available again and can be put on to the list 
 of available nodes again.
nodes.name: notifyAvailability

nodes.documentation: @dev save function that can be called by anyone that fixes uninitialzed values.
nodes.name: upgrade

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns an array of the current active pools (the staking addresses of candidates and validators).
 The size of the array cannot exceed MAX_CANDIDATES. A pool can be added to this array with the `_addPoolActive`
 internal function which is called by the `stake` or `orderWithdraw` function. A pool is considered active
 if its address has at least the minimum stake and this stake is not ordered to be withdrawn.
nodes.name: getPools
getPoolPublicKey
getPoolInternetAddress

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns an array of the current inactive pools (the staking addresses of former candidates).
 A pool can be added to this array with the `_addPoolInactive` internal function which is called
 by `_removePool`. A pool is considered inactive if it is banned for some reason, if its address
 has zero stake, or if its entire stake is ordered to be withdrawn.
nodes.name: getPoolsInactive

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the array of stake amounts for each corresponding
 address in the `poolsToBeElected` array (see the `getPoolsToBeElected` getter) and a sum of these amounts.
 Used by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function when randomly selecting new validators at the last
 block of a staking epoch. An array value is updated every time any staked amount is changed in this pool
 (see the `_setLikelihood` internal function).
 @return `uint256[] likelihoods` - The array of the coefficients. The array length is always equal to the length
 of the `poolsToBeElected` array.
 `uint256 sum` - The total sum of the amounts.
nodes.name: getPoolsLikelihood

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the list of pools (their staking addresses) which will participate in a new validator set
 selection process in the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function. This is an array of pools
 which will be considered as candidates when forming a new validator set (at the last block of a staking epoch).
 This array is kept updated by the `_addPoolToBeElected` and `_deletePoolToBeElected` internal functions.
nodes.name: getPoolsToBeElected

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the list of pools (their staking addresses) which will be removed by the
 `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function from the active `pools` array (at the last block
 of a staking epoch). This array is kept updated by the `_addPoolToBeRemoved`
 and `_deletePoolToBeRemoved` internal functions. A pool is added to this array when the pool's
 address withdraws (or orders) all of its own staking coins from the pool, inactivating the pool.
nodes.name: getPoolsToBeRemoved

nodes.documentation:
@dev Determines whether staking/withdrawal operations are allowed at the moment.
 Used by all staking/withdrawal functions.
nodes.name: areStakeAndWithdrawAllowed

@dev indicates the time when the new validatorset for the next epoch gets chosen.
 this is the start of a timeframe before the end of the epoch,
 that is long enough for the validators
 to create a new shared key.
nodes.name: startTimeOfNextPhaseTransition

nodes.documentation:
@dev Returns the max number of candidates (including validators). See the MAX_CANDIDATES constant.
 Needed mostly for unit tests.
nodes.name: _getMaxCandidates
_isPoolEmpty
_isPoolToBeElected
_isWithdrawAllowed

addPool(address,bytes,bytes16).details: Adds a new candidate's pool to the list of active pools (see the `getPools` getter) and moves the specified amount of staking coins from the candidate's staking address to the candidate's pool. A participant calls this function using their staking address when they want to create a pool. This is a wrapper for the `stake` function.

params._miningAddress: The mining address of the candidate. The mining address is bound to the staking address (msg.sender). This address cannot be equal to `msg.sender`.

areStakeAndWithdrawAllowed().details: Determines whether staking/withdrawal operations are allowed at the moment. Used by all staking/withdrawal functions.

claimOrderedWithdraw(address).details: Withdraws the staking coins from the specified pool ordered during the previous staking epochs with the `orderWithdraw` function. The ordered amount can be retrieved by the `orderedWithdrawAmount` getter.

params._poolStakingAddress: The staking address of the pool from which the ordered coins are withdrawn.

getPoolInternetAddress(address).details: Returns the registered IPv4 Address for the node.

params._poolAddress: The Pool Address to query the IPv4Address for.

getPoolInternetAddress(address).return: IPv4 Address for the given pool address.

getPoolPublicKey(address).details: Return the Public Key used by a Node to send targeted HBBFT Consensus Messages.

params._poolAddress: The Pool Address to query the public key for.

getPoolPublicKey(address).return: the public key for the given pool address.  Note that the public key does not convert to the ethereum address of the pool address. The pool address is used for stacking, and not for signing HBBFT messages.

getPools().details: Returns an array of the current active pools (the staking addresses of candidates and validators). The size of the array cannot exceed MAX_CANDIDATES. A pool can be added to this array with the `_addPoolActive` internal function which is called by the `stake` or `orderWithdraw` function. A pool is considered active if its address has at least the minimum stake and this stake is not ordered to be withdrawn.

getPoolsInactive().details: Returns an array of the current inactive pools (the staking addresses of former candidates). A pool can be added to this array with the `_addPoolInactive` internal function which is called by `_removePool`. A pool is considered inactive if it is banned for some reason, if its address has zero stake, or if its entire stake is ordered to be withdrawn.

getPoolsLikelihood().details: Returns the array of stake amounts for each corresponding address in the `poolsToBeElected` array (see the `getPoolsToBeElected` getter) and a sum of these amounts. Used by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function when randomly selecting new validators at the last block of a staking epoch. An array value is updated every time any staked amount is changed in this pool (see the `_setLikelihood` internal function).
getPoolsLikelihood().return: `uint256[] likelihoods` - The array of the coefficients. The array length is always equal to the length of the `poolsToBeElected` array. `uint256 sum` - The total sum of the amounts.

getPoolsToBeElected().details: Returns the list of pools (their staking addresses) which will participate in a new validator set selection process in the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function. This is an array of pools which will be considered as candidates when forming a new validator set (at the last block of a staking epoch). This array is kept updated by the `_addPoolToBeElected` and `_deletePoolToBeElected` internal functions.

getPoolsToBeRemoved().details: Returns the list of pools (their staking addresses) which will be removed by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function from the active `pools` array (at the last block of a staking epoch). This array is kept updated by the `_addPoolToBeRemoved` and `_deletePoolToBeRemoved` internal functions. A pool is added to this array when the pool's address withdraws (or orders) all of its own staking coins from the pool, inactivating the pool.

incrementStakingEpoch().details: Increments the serial number of the current staking epoch. Called by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` at the last block of the finished staking epoch.

initialize(address,address[],uint256,uin.details: Initializes the network parameters. Can only be called by the constructor of the `InitializerHbbft` contract or owner.

params._candidateMinStake: The minimum allowed amount of candidate/validator stake in Wei.
params._delegatorMinStake: The minimum allowed amount of delegator stake in Wei.
params._initialStakingAddresses: The array of initial validators' staking addresses.
params._stakingFixedEpochDuration: The fixed duration of each epoch before keyGen starts.
params._stakingTransitionTimeframeLength: Length of the timeframe in seconds for the transition to the new validator set.
params._stakingWithdrawDisallowPeriod: The duration period at the end of a staking epoch during which participants cannot stake/withdraw/order/claim their staking coins

isInitialized().details: Returns a boolean flag indicating if the `initialize` function has been called.

isPoolActive(address).details: Returns a flag indicating whether a specified address is in the `pools` array. See the `getPools` getter.

params._stakingAddress: The staking address of the pool.

maxWithdrawAllowed(address,address).details: Returns the maximum amount which can be withdrawn from the specified pool by the specified staker at the moment. Used by the `withdraw` and `moveStake` functions.

params._poolStakingAddress: The pool staking address from which the withdrawal will be made.
params._staker: The staker address that is going to withdraw.

maxWithdrawOrderAllowed(address,address).details: Returns the maximum amount which can be ordered to be withdrawn from the specified pool by the specified staker at the moment. Used by the `orderWithdraw` function.

params._poolStakingAddress: The pool staking address from which the withdrawal will be ordered.
params._staker: The staker address that is going to order the withdrawal.

moveStake(address,address,uint256).details: Moves staking coins from one pool to another. A staker calls this function when they want to move their coins from one pool to another without withdrawing their coins.

params._amount: The amount of staking coins to be moved. The amount cannot exceed the value returned by the `maxWithdrawAllowed` getter.
params._fromPoolStakingAddress: The staking address of the source pool.
params._toPoolStakingAddress: The staking address of the target pool.

notifyAvailability(address).details: Notifies hbbft staking contract that a validator asociated with the given `_stakingAddress` became available again and can be put on to the list  of available nodes again.

notifyKeyGenFailed().details: Notifies hbbft staking contract that the key generation has failed, and a new round  of keygeneration starts.

notifyNetworkOfftimeDetected(uint256).details: Notifies hbbft staking contract about a detected network offline time. if there is no handling for this, validators got chosen outside the transition timewindow and get banned immediatly, since they never got their chance to write their keys. more about: https://github.com/DMDcoin/hbbft-posdao-contracts/issues/96

orderWithdraw(address,int256).details: Orders coins withdrawal from the staking address of the specified pool to the staker's address. The requested coins can be claimed after the current staking epoch is complete using the `claimOrderedWithdraw` function.

params._amount: The amount to be withdrawn. A positive value means the staker wants to either set or increase their withdrawal amount. A negative value means the staker wants to decrease a withdrawal amount that was previously set. The amount cannot exceed the value returned by the `maxWithdrawOrderAllowed` getter.
params._poolStakingAddress: The staking address of the pool from which the amount will be withdrawn.

poolDelegators(address).details: Returns an array of the current active delegators of the specified pool. A delegator is considered active if they have staked into the specified pool and their stake is not ordered to be withdrawn.

poolDelegatorsInactive(address).details: Returns an array of the current inactive delegators of the specified pool. A delegator is considered inactive if their entire stake is ordered to be withdrawn but not yet claimed.

removeMyPool().details: Removes the candidate's or validator's pool from the `pools` array (a list of active pools which can be retrieved by the `getPools` getter). When a candidate or validator wants to remove their pool, they should call this function from their staking address.

removePool(address).details: Removes a specified pool from the `pools` array (a list of active pools which can be retrieved by the `getPools` getter). Called by the `ValidatorSetHbbft._removeMaliciousValidator` internal function,  and the `ValidatorSetHbbft.handleFailedKeyGeneration` function when a pool must be removed by the algorithm.

params._stakingAddress: The staking address of the pool to be removed.

removePools().details: Removes pools which are in the `_poolsToBeRemoved` internal array from the `pools` array. Called by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function when a pool must be removed by the algorithm.

setCandidateMinStake(uint256).details: Sets (updates) the limit of the minimum candidate stake (CANDIDATE_MIN_STAKE). Can only be called by the `owner`.

params._minStake: The value of a new limit in Wei.

setDelegatorMinStake(uint256).details: Sets (updates) the limit of the minimum delegator stake (DELEGATOR_MIN_STAKE). Can only be called by the `owner`.

params._minStake: The value of a new limit in Wei.

setPoolInfo(bytes,bytes16).details: set's the pool info for a specific ethereum address.

params._ip: (optional) IPV4 address of a running Node Software or Proxy. Stores the supplied data for a staking (pool) address. This function is external available without security checks, since no array operations are used in the implementation, this allows the flexibility to set the pool information before adding the stake to the pool.
params._publicKey: public key of the (future) signing address.

setStakingEpochStartTime(uint256).details: Sets the timetamp of the current epoch's last block as the start time of the upcoming staking epoch. Called by the `ValidatorSetHbbft.newValidatorSet` function at the last block of a staking epoch.

params._timestamp: The starting time of the very first block in the upcoming staking epoch.

stake(address).details: Moves the specified amount of staking coins from the staker's address to the staking address of the specified pool. Actually, the amount is stored in a balance of this StakingHbbft contract. A staker calls this function when they want to make a stake into a pool.

params._toPoolStakingAddress: The staking address of the pool where the coins should be staked.

stakeAmountByCurrentEpoch(address,addres.details: Returns the amount of staking coins staked into the specified pool by the specified staker during the current staking epoch (see the `stakingEpoch` getter). Used by the `stake`, `withdraw`, and `orderWithdraw` functions.

stakingFixedEpochEndTime().details: Returns an indicative time of the last block of the current staking epoch before key generation starts.

startTimeOfNextPhaseTransition().details: indicates the time when the new validatorset for the next epoch gets chosen. this is the start of a timeframe before the end of the epoch, that is long enough for the validators to create a new shared key.

upgrade().details: save function that can be called by anyone that fixes uninitialzed values.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Moves the specified amount of staking coins from the staking address of the specified pool to the staker's address. A staker calls this function when they want to withdraw their coins.

params._amount: The amount of coins to be withdrawn. The amount cannot exceed the value returned by the `maxWithdrawAllowed` getter.
params._fromPoolStakingAddress: The staking address of the pool from which the coins should be withdrawn.
